item.description:
Let's get together and play some games.  Feel free to bring some of your own.

Bring some quarters and we can play the left, right, center game.

I have a wii, playstation and xbox. Bowling anyone?

Bring something to share to eat and it's always nice if you can list what you bring, so we don't all bring  the same thing.

Bring your own alcohol.

Hope to see you!
item.how_to_find_us: I will email you an address prior to the event

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Game night and potluck
